conbody.p: HDFS File Metadata executorinput fileThe input file is the file with metadata that you want to change. By default, the HDFS File Metadata executor uses the following expression for the input file: ${record:value('/file_path')}

In this expression, file_path is the field in the event record. The event records generated by the Hadoop FS, Local FS, and MapR FS destinations include a file_path field that contains the location and name of the files that the destinations close.
For more information about the event records generated by the destinations, see "Event Record" in the destination documentation.
